beauty_cosmetics.name: Hydrating Face Moisturizer
beauty_cosmetics.description: CeraVe Hydrating Face Moisturizer is designed to nourish and protect your skin with ceramides and hyaluronic acid. It provides long-lasting hydration and is perfect for sensitive skin types.

beauty_cosmetics.name: Matte Liquid Foundation
beauty_cosmetics.description: Achieve a flawless matte finish with Maybelline's liquid foundation. This full-coverage, oil-free formula controls shine and lasts all day, making it perfect for oily and combination skin.

beauty_cosmetics.name: Long-Lasting Lipstick
beauty_cosmetics.description: MAC's iconic lipstick delivers intense color payoff and a velvety matte finish. With a smudge-proof formula, this lipstick stays vibrant throughout the day.

beauty_cosmetics.name: Vitamin C Face Serum
beauty_cosmetics.description: Revitalize your skin with The Ordinary’s Vitamin C Face Serum. This powerful antioxidant formula brightens skin tone, reduces fine lines, and boosts hydration.

beauty_cosmetics.name: Waterproof Mascara
beauty_cosmetics.description: Get bold, dramatic lashes with L'Oréal's Waterproof Mascara. This long-lasting formula resists smudging and provides intense volume and length for all-day wear.

beauty_cosmetics.name: Organic Argan Hair Oil
beauty_cosmetics.description: Repair and protect your hair with Moroccanoil’s Organic Argan Hair Oil. Infused with Vitamin E and essential fatty acids, this formula nourishes, smooths, and strengthens dry and damaged hair.

beauty_cosmetics.name: Exfoliating Body Scrub
beauty_cosmetics.description: Experience smooth, glowing skin with Tree Hut's Exfoliating Body Scrub. Infused with shea butter and natural oils, it deeply exfoliates while keeping skin hydrated and refreshed.

beauty_cosmetics.name: Natural Glow Highlighter
beauty_cosmetics.description: Get the perfect glow with Fenty Beauty’s Natural Glow Highlighter. This lightweight formula blends effortlessly for a buildable, radiant shimmer that enhances your natural beauty.
